info.description:
pyrouted
========

network configuration daemon, based on pyroute2 library.

pyrouted aims to be a server network configuration solution with the following features:

* Socket activated.
* Runnable in daemon and action-then-quit modes.
* Human readable snapshots of the network configurations.
* Simple command line interface.
info.name: pyrouted
